title: Interpretation of a dream about a crocodile in the house in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a crocodile in the house in a dream, which is one of the dreams that a person sees when he changes someone who wants to know its meaning and interpretations, let us discover all the interpretations that talk about a dream about a crocodile in the house in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a crocodile in the house in a dream Seeing a crocodile inside the house in a dream is a sign of tension and sadness for the family. Whoever dreams of a crocodile in the house, this is a sign that there is someone who prefers him near him. A dream about a crocodile inside the house in a dream is an indication of forbidden acts. Seeing a crocodile in the house is a sign of the illegal things he does. Anyone who dreams of a crocodile in the house is a sign of illegitimate money. Seeing someone turn into a crocodile in a dream is a sign of immorality and immorality. Taking the crocodile out of the house in a dream is an indication of problems and negative issues. Interpretation of a dream about eating crocodile meat in a dream Whoever dreams that he is eating crocodile meat, this is a sign of his intelligence and intelligence. A dream about eating a crocodile is a sign of victory over enemies. A person who sees in his dream that he is eating crocodile meat is a sign that he will get a lot of money. A dream about eating crocodile meat indicates the profits that he will get soon. When you see Eating crocodile meat in a dream indicates wisdom and the right decisions that a person makes. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a crocodile Whoever sees a dead crocodile in his dream is a sign of a hidden enemy who does not show his hostility. Dreaming of many dead crocodiles in a dream is a sign of deception and deception from friends and relatives. Whoever sees a dead crocodile in his dream is a sign of the harm that he will soon suffer. When you see a dead crocodile in a dream, this is an indication of the psychological and physical harm that will happen to him near those close to him. Interpretation of dreams of a crocodile running after me and chasing me in a dream Whoever sees in a dream that there is a crocodile running after him and catching him, this is a sign of the moral negativity of the vision. A dream about a crocodile chasing someone, a sign of wrong things he does. Whoever dreams that a crocodile is chasing him in his house, this is a sign of unpleasant surprises that will happen to him. A dream about running in front of a crocodile and a crocodile chasing them in a dream, is an indication of the damage and crises that will befall him in his life. Interpretation of a dream about a crocodile that bit me in a dream A crocodile bite in a dream is generally unpleasant visions. Seeing A crocodile in a dream means harm and damage to a person in a dream. The dream of a crocodile that bit me in a dream is an indication of obstacles and problems in the dreamer's life. Whoever sees that a crocodile bites, this is evidence that he has committed sins and must repent and return to God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream of a person turning into a crocodile Whoever sees in his dream that a person turns into a crocodile, this is a sign of harm to that person. A person I know has turned into a crocodile in a dream, which is an indication of the deception and evil character that this person hides. If the dreamer sees him turning into a crocodile in a dream, this is evidence of his distance from God Almighty and his commission of many sins and disobedience. If the solution

title: Interpretation of a dream about wheat

preview.html: Seeing wheat in a dream is one of the visions that raises many questions and needs accurate and correct interpretation because it can indicate food and goodness. Seeing wheat in a dream: Wheat in a dream indicates money and livelihood, so whoever dreams of harvesting grain, this is a sign of a lot of money that he will obtain and can To symbolize success in life, marriage, and justice for children. If a man sees grains of wheat falling from his hands, this is evidence of waste, and seeing wheat in a dream is evidence of goodness, overcoming difficulties, and getting rid of worries and problems. Whoever sees yellow wheat in his dream, this symbolizes Success in the dreamer’s life and the fulfillment of his dreams. You may also be interested in: Interpretation of seeing food in a dream Interpretation of wheat in a dream by Ibn Sirin The scholar Ibn Sirin interprets the dreamer’s dream of wheat as good and halal food, and bags of wheat indicate the great responsibility that the dreamer bears that will benefit him. Seeing buckwheat It symbolizes a woman who is left behind in her home, and whoever sees in a dream that wheat is destroyed by rain water, this is a sign from God that he should be careful and preserve his money. Seeing harvesting wheat illustrates the approach to achieving the goal. Dreaming of planting wheat in a dream indicates a mission that seeks God’s satisfaction, and whoever tries to plant it, this is evidence of jihad. Whoever sees in his dream that he is planting wheat and the land produces barley, this is evidence that his outward appearance is better than his appearance. And if the dreamer sees himself planting wheat and the ground grows in its place, then this is evidence of usury. And whoever sees in his dream that he collects the ears of a plant whose owner he knows, then he has scattered money on its owner, and whoever sees wheat harvested at the wrong time, then this is a sign of death, and if the ears Yellow in it. Color, this is evidence of the death of the elderly. If the ears are green, this is evidence of the death or killing of the young. Seeing wheat in bed is a sign of a woman’s pregnancy, and whoever sees in a dream that he is planting crops, this is evidence of a woman. She became pregnant. And if the dreamer sees himself plowing someone else’s land and knows its owner, this is evidence of his marriage to this person’s wife. And whoever sees himself planting wheat seeds at the right time, this is evidence of good deeds. And whoever dreams of eating dried or cooked wheat in a dream, this is an unpleasant vision. If the dreamer sees himself walking among the harvested wheat, then this is evidence that he is walking in the ranks of the mujahideen, and whoever sees himself eating green, moist wheat, then this is evidence of Saladin. You may also be interested in: Seeing pieces of raw meat in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about cooking for a divorced woman. Seeing bags. Wheat in a dream Dream interpreters interpret seeing bags of wheat in a dream as a good vision, indicating positive opportunities that will be available to the founder in the coming period, and if the dreamer is pregnant, this is evidence that she will give birth to twins, and God knows best. Seeing bags of wheat in a married woman’s dream is a sign of the many paths in her life, and if the dreamer is a man, then this symbolizes the imminent fulfillment of his dreams and desires. Ibn Sirin says in his interpretation that seeing bags of wheat in a dream for an unmarried woman

title: Ibn Sirin's interpretations of seeing King Abdullah in a dream after his death

preview.html: Seeing kings in a dream has many meanings, knowing that a large number of interpreters have agreed that this vision is one of the good visions that brings more good than bad, and today we will review the interpretation of seeing King Abdullah in a dream after his death and for single, married and pregnant women. Seeing King Abdullah in a dream after his death A dream after his death: Seeing King Abdullah in a dream after his death is a sign that the dreamer will reach a prominent position in the coming days and this position will help him improve his social and material level, and from this journey it is very good and nutritional. Seeing King Abdullah in a dream after his death, as Ibn Shaheen, indicating that the owner of the vision will be able to get rid of the sorrows that dominate his life, and will be able to recognize the truth of every person, and the evil will be removed from his life forever. The dream also symbolizes victory over enemies and victory over everyone. He tried hard to make the dreamer fall into evil, but whoever sees the frown and anger on the face of King Abdullah, this is a sign of the dreamer’s backwardness. In his religious duties.Seeing King Abdullah in a dream after his death at the hands of Ibn SirinIbn Sirin showed that seeing King Abdullah in a dream after his death means that this man is completely satisfied with the dreamer. The dreamer will become bright. The dreamer's life approaching King Abdullah entering the dreamer's house is a sign that a lot of goodness will enter his house. Seeing King Abdullah in a dream after his death for an unmarried woman. Seeing King Abdullah, may God have mercy on him, in a dream for an unmarried woman means that she is very close to assuming power. A new job, knowing that the job will bring her a lot of kindness and livelihood. The rich have prestige and power. As for an unmarried woman who dreams that King Abdullah is walking towards her and holding a great sword in his hands, this is a sign that she will enjoy pride and luxury in her life, and seeing that wise and just king over an unmarried woman carries many positive signs. Including her approaching marriage to a man of influence and status. She is still studying and dreams of excelling a lot in her academic life. King Abdullah, may God have mercy on him, seeing in his dream one woman going through a difficult period, the dream indicates that he will be able to overcome this period and enter a more calm and stable phase. Seeing King Abdullah in a dream after his death about a married woman When a married woman dreams of King Abdullah in her dream, this Evidence that stability will affect her marital life, especially since she has recently gone through many problems with her husband. Her husband’s illness: The dream indicates the approaching death of her husband, and she will be very sad. As for her dream of receiving King Abdullah in her home, this indicates the presence of important people in her life through whom she will gain a lot. Benefits.Seeing King Abdullah, may God have mercy on him, in a working married woman’s dream, the dream indicates that she will get a promotion very soon. Indicating that her husband will receive a promotion soon, knowing that he has waited a long time to see the king

title: Interpretation of seeing guards in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing pulp in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam Al-Sadiq. Scientists and jurists interpreted dreams and visions through the vision website roy2a.com, as seeing the legislator in a dream has many connotations and interpretations. Through our topic, we talk about the single girl, the married girl, the pregnant girl, the man and the young man. What is the interpretation of seeing a masseuse in a dream for a single girl? Seeing an unmarried Mahras girl in a dream is testimony to the strength of her personality and the sobriety of her ability to make the right decisions. An unmarried girl sees an unbalanced Mahras in a dream. Meaning On her marriage to a corrupt young man, and in a state of balance, she declares his high morals and the world’s love for her. Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream for a filly is a sign of wisdom, people’s love for her, her generosity and faith in others. Seeing a mute in a dream indicates the approach of the Gulf and the death of worries and sorrows. See also: Interpretation of seeing a child’s cradle In a dream: What is the interpretation of a married woman seeing a mahras in a dream? Seeing a married woman of a mahras in a dream is a sign of helping others and feeding the needy and the poor. Seeing a married mahras wife in a dream is a sign warning her of righteousness among men and fear of God in them. Seeing a mahras wife in a dream is an indication of her need for justice between her children and her husband’s children. And change her life for the better and end her sorrows and pain. Seeing a married mare’s wife in a dream is a sign of getting rid of all her problems and pressures. It is one of the most promising visions for her. See also: Interpretation of seeing a child’s urine in a dream. What is the interpretation of a man who sees dough in a dream? A man who sees mash in a dream is an indication of his integrity. His righteousness and support from God in all areas of his life. A man seeing a scale in a dream is an example of reassurance in his life and his sense of peace of mind and psychological peace. Seeing a scale in a dream has many connotations and interpretations, including bringing about many changes in the dreamer’s life and bringing him kindness and abundance of sustenance and blessing. See also: Interpretation of a mechanical vision In a dream, what is the interpretation of a pregnant woman who sees dough in a dream? Seeing a pregnant woman with mash in a dream is a sign of facilitating her birth and giving birth to a healthy, healthy child. Seeing a pregnant woman with mush in a dream is a sign that she has a beautiful little girl with a bright future and a strong personality and wisdom. Seeing a pregnant woman with an unbalanced filly in The dream indicates her speed in decision-making and a warning about her behavior and style with others. Seeing a pregnant filly in a dream indicates many important changes in his life and an increase in her husband’s livelihood with the arrival of her child. See also: Interpretation of seeing a vagina in a dream. What is the interpretation of a young man who sees mush in a dream? A vision. For a young man to see mash in a dream indicates the beginning of a happy and joyful life and a complete change in his life for the better. A young man seeing mash in a dream indicates his relationship with a good girl and the high morals that people love. He has a strong personality and a sober mind. Seeing mash in a dream for a young man is an indication of his joining a prestigious and important job in the state. Seeing a young man who is mute in a dream indicates the approaching relief, loss of worries, and extreme sadness alive

title: Discover the interpretation of a dream about the birth of a son for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a married woman giving birth in a dream: There is a firm belief among many women, which is that the symbol of giving birth to a male in a dream is bad and is interpreted as dissatisfaction. The correct meanings of the symbol of giving birth to a son for a married woman in the article below. You have a dream that confuses you. You are waiting for it.. Search on Google for an online dream interpretation site. Interpretation of a dream about the birth of a married woman. Seeing the birth of a boy in a married woman’s dream warns her of increasing problems in her home and a major crisis may occur with her husband in reality. If a married woman sees that she is pregnant and goes to When she entered her family's house and gave birth to a boy in her father and mother's room, the dream confirms the occurrence of distress and serious disagreements between the dreamer and her family when he was... Awake.Seeing the birth of a dead boy in a dream symbolizes a misfortune that happened to the dreamer’s head some time ago, and the time has come for rest and peace. Note that this interpretation is specific to a married woman to whom God has given daughters. And boys in reality. Seeing the birth of a boy with the head of a scorpion or snake in a dream indicates crises that the dreamer will fall into due to active work, which means that she has a very cunning enemy who will raise a lot of problems in her life until he harasses her and increases her problems. If a married woman gives birth to a boy in a place Working in a dream, this scene warns the dreamer that there are many work problems and she will feel sad and upset in this job, and it is best to gradually withdraw from her current job. And look for a new job. When a married woman gives birth to a son in the street and exposes her genitals in front of people in a dream, the vision is bad, and jurists say that scandals will haunt the dreamer throughout her life and tarnish her reputation among the people. Interpretation of a dream about the birth of a boy for a married woman in Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said that seeing the birth of a boy is not very promising, especially if the woman cries a lot in the dream while giving birth to the boy. But if the dreamer wants to get pregnant and give birth in reality, and waits for many years until God accepts her prayer and places her in She got pregnant, and saw in a dream that she gave birth to a beautiful boy, and the birth went safely and smoothly. She does not see blood, nor does she feel pain. These symbols are benign and the dreamer heralds pregnancy in the future. Close. And if the married woman (who in reality did not become pregnant or give birth) gave birth in a dream to a beautiful boy, but he died, and this matter shocked the dreamer and made her cry and scream a lot in the dream, then the vision is bad and indicates that the dreamer is suffering from infertility and the inability to have children, but God He can change fate with supplication, prayer, and many alms. Ibn Sirin announced that a pregnant woman who gives birth to a handsome child in a dream will give birth to a beautiful girl with a happy face. If a pregnant woman gives birth to a girl in a dream, she will soon give birth to a male child. title: Interpretation of a dream about being hit by a snake

preview.html: When a person sees a snake in a dream, the dreamer may experience more anxiety, fear, and panic. This may be a warning of trouble or the presence of an enemy near you, but killing the snake may be evidence of getting rid of it. All problems. Interpretation of a dream about being hit by a snake. If one sees in a dream that he is hitting a snake and killing it, this may be a sign that he will marry a woman soon. If one sees in a dream that he is the ruler and collects snakes, hit them and then kill them. This may prove that he is capable of defeating the enemy With the worst defeat and victory over him. If a person sees in a dream that snakes and serpents are killed in the market after being beaten. This may be an indication of the outbreak of war with an enemy of his, as it indicates the victory of that enemy over him, and God knows best. If a person sees in a dream that he cut a snake After it was hanging around his neck. It may be an indication that the dreamer is divorcing his wife, and God knows best. If one sees in a dream that he is eating a snake or a snake, it may be in it. An indication that he is victorious over the enemy and defeats him, God willing. If one sees his beard cut to Cut into two halves in a dream, this may be a sign of his victory over his enemies. When a person dreams that he is eating a snake, his stomach swells and is infected with its poison. This may be an indication that he is fighting his enemy and will obtain a lot of money from him. If the effect of the poison is great, this may mean that he is fighting His enemy with all his strength and ferocity. When a person sees in a dream that he strikes a snake and kills it. This may indicate that he is keeping away from sins and disobedience, and also indicates that he is returning to the path of truth and righteousness. We have chosen for you: The snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a snake struck in a dream and not killed. If he sees that it is He struck a snake and was unable to kill it. This may indicate that the dreamer cannot get rid of the bad deeds he is doing, so he should hasten to ask for forgiveness. When a person sees in his dream that he struck a snake and was unable to kill it, this may be an indication that he cannot defeat it. His enemy, and therefore he must approach God to help him against his enemy. In the event that someone sees a large black snake and is able to strike and kill him. It may be evidence of his ability to get rid of a strong enemy. It also indicates that he will get rid of a major problem that was hindering his life. When he sees Someone dreams that he has been bitten by a snake. This may indicate a warning to him that there is an enemy near him. Regardless of killing him, this may mean defeating him and getting rid of these problems, God willing. When a person sees in a dream that he struck the snake and did not kill it, this may indicate If Satan defeats him, let him hasten to repent and seek forgiveness so that God will help him against his devil. When a person sees in a dream that there is a snake and he kills that snake. This may indicate that he is released from the conspiracy that was planned for him. If a person sees in his dream that he struck a snake. It may be You have evidence that he overcame problems and fears. Interpretation of seeing and killing a snake in a dream for young people and its meaning. In the event that a single person sees a snake in a dream without any harm to the snake or to him and that snake goes away safely. It may be an indication that he is getting rid of a problem in

title: Interpretation of seeing a bat in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a bat in a dream: A bat is a mammal that can fly and can indicate pessimism, and seeing it in a dream indicates magic, sorcery, evil, and harming others. Commentators differed on the interpretation of seeing a bat in a dream, whether the vision was about a single, married, pregnant, or divorced woman, and we will present it today through the vision website. We will refer to the interpretation of seeing a bat in a dream in detail, based on the opinion of major commentators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq, or contemporary translators, so follow us on the Roya website. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a bat in a dream? Seeing a male bat in a dream indicates a religious man Seeing a female bat indicates an evil witch. Dreaming of a sleeping bat indicates longevity. What is the interpretation of seeing a bat in a man’s dream? If a man sees a dead bat, this indicates bad luck. Seeing a bat in a man’s dream indicates the presence of a hypocrite in his life. If a young man sees a bat flying Above his head, it indicates wealth and riches. What is the interpretation of seeing a bat in a dream for a single woman? Seeing a bat in an unmarried girl’s dream also portends success in the girl’s marriage to a religious man. Seeing a bat in a girl’s dream can indicate confusion, anxiety, and repeated hesitation. What is the interpretation Seeing a bat in a dream for a married woman? Seeing a bat in a married woman’s dream. This may indicate working magic and sorcery or harboring evil for people. Dreaming of a bat in the house in a married woman’s dream indicates childbirth if she has not yet given birth because it indicates longevity. What is the interpretation of seeing a bat in a dream? For a pregnant woman? Seeing a black bat in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates problems and pain during pregnancy and may indicate the presence of envy and hatred in her life. Seeing a bat in a dream for a pregnant woman. Mention the date of your next birth and what suits it. What is the interpretation of seeing a bat in a dream for a divorced or widowed woman? If a divorced woman or a widow sees A black bat in her dream indicates the presence of hypocritical friends who are causing her harm and mistreatment. If a divorced or widow sees that she is selling or buying a bat, it indicates good luck and the fulfillment of her desires. What is the interpretation of a bat bite in a dream? Seeing a bat bite in a dream for a girl indicates many The problems that you are following. Seeing a bat bite on a married woman may indicate a deteriorating financial situation and the recurrence of marriage problems. What is the interpretation of a bat entering the house in a dream? If anyone sees a bat entering the house, it indicates family and family problems that lead to quarrels and bad news. Seeing a white bat attack indicates To the death of a family member. What is the interpretation of a bat in a dream by Al-Osaimi? Seeing a bat attack in a dream. Many of life’s problems indicate financial hardship, problems at work, and marital disputes. A person’s survival from a bat in a dream indicates freedom from problems and crises. We are pleased to see the reception of your dream about “ Interpretation of seeing a bat” through comments and the dream team will interpret your dream, respond and communicate with you.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing the complete funeral prayer in a dream?

preview.html: Khadot website provides you with an interpretation of seeing a dead person’s prayer in full in a dream. God is all evidence and interpretation in the interpretation of the dream of praying for the dead, and we also present to you the interpretation of the dream of praying for the dead, known or unknown. We also tell you the complete details of the funeral prayer in a dream for married women, the elderly, and pregnant women, as well as for men, from the books of major scholars in the interpretation of dreams and visions. If you are interested in the explanation, you should follow the article. Why do you dream of praying in memory of Ibn Sirin? The interpretation of a dead person praying in the mosque and going to the funeral may indicate that the dreamer follows a corrupt and unjust ruler, and seeing the funeral in the mosque and praying over it may indicate a new friendship or relationship in his life. Seeing a dreamer carrying a full coffin in a dream means a long life, and this means good and great support for him in his next life, and carrying a full coffin in a dream in general is one of the good visions for his dreamer. Why dream that you are praying for the dead in a dream is complete evidence that business Good deeds have occurred in the dreamer’s life. See also: Why dream of praying the Great Maghreb in a full dream? Why dream of a memorial prayer for a single woman? Interpretation of a dream about a dead person praying in a full dream for an unmarried girl with visions, testifying to her confusion and anxiety in her life, and carrying the dead person on her neck It indicates longevity, as well as a lot of money and prestige. The interpretation of praying for a dead person in the mosque in a girl’s dream testifies to her high status and the acquaintance of new friends, as it came to the girl as evidence of her kindness, usefulness, and success in study and work. Why do we dream that we pray for an unknown dead person to a woman? Praying is good news that in her next life she will find a good husband for herself. See also: Why dream of saying a complete prayer in a dream? A supplication of remembrance in a complete dream for a married womanWhy dream that you are praying for a married woman It is clear that she is completely dead in a dream, and this dead person is still She is alive, which testifies to the emergence of many problems in her life and may indicate many problems between her and her husband. Funeral prayers in a dream are full of visions for a woman that may be related to separation from her husband, and indicate family quarrels. On the contrary, the scene of a funeral Already dead indicates that she is close to pregnancy. The funeral of a martyr in a woman’s dream is one of the visions that indicate a great blessing and receiving a blessing and what she wanted and hoped for from God, and evidence that the woman is pregnant from her husband. The child who will be fair to them. See also: Why do you dream of kissing a dead person in a complete dream? Why dream of praying in memory of a pregnant woman? Seeing the complete memorial prayer of a martyr for a pregnant woman in a dream is evidence that she gave birth to a male child, and that the martyr’s funeral in a complete dream, as a whole, comes from visions It indicates her kindness and abundance. Of food for her and her husband. And her fetus. The memorial prayer in her dream indicates her safety and the safety of the new baby, and this indicates an easy and accessible birth without problems and suffering, and that she and her fetus are in good health, and this is evidence of the length of the period. Life, and God knows best. See also: Why dream of seeing dead people?

title: The 20 most important interpretations of seeing insects in a single woman’s dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing insects in a dream for a single woman. Many girls dream of seeing insects in a dream. Of course, this vision causes panic and fear in them and raises many questions about its meaning. When searching for the interpretations of scholars such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen and others, we found hundreds of different clues. According to the dreamer’s vision of insects, they could be flying, black, green, and various other types. They will be discussed in detail in this article. Seeing insects in a dream for a single woman: Seeing insects in one dream carries negative connotations, such as: Seeing insects in food in a girl’s dream can warn her of illness due to negligence. Interpretation of a single woman’s dream of insects may indicate preventing livelihood from sources Unreliable. Black insects in a dream symbolize haters and envious people. If the dreamer sees that she is running away from insects in a dream, then she wants to achieve her goals despite stumbling on her way and facing some obstacles. Seeing insects in a dream for an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin, in the process of discussing the interpretations of scholars about seeing insects in A human dream, we shed light on the famous scholar Ibn Sirin: Ibn Sirin interprets seeing insects in an unmarried woman’s dream because it may indicate that she is suffering from worries and problems. Flying insects in an unmarried woman’s dream may indicate stumbling in achieving her dreams because of some enemies standing in the way. Her way. The large number of insects in the dream of a student who is studying may warn her of failure in her studies and failure. If the dreamer is engaged, and she sees insects in her dream, this is evidence that there are problems and disagreements between her and her fiancé. The interpretation of seeing insects in the dream of an unmarried woman, according to Ibn Sirin, can symbolize their bad qualities or distort their reputation among people. Ibn Sirin says that the emergence of insects from the body of an unmarried woman is evidence of her recovery from an imminent illness. Seeing insects in a dream for an unmarried woman by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen mentioned in his interpretation of seeing insects in a dream Women have several different indicators depending on their type: Ibn Shaheen says that if an unmarried woman sees herself killing an insect in her dream, she will overcome a problem she faces and find a solution. Seeing a girl holding insects in her hand indicates that she has been deceived by those close to her and that there is someone among them who carries grudges and hatred. As for the dreamer seeing a huge insect harming her in a dream, it may indicate her participation in a major disaster. Ibn Shaheen states that seeing an insect such as a mother of forty-four children in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates the presence of a disreputable woman near her. A spider in a girl’s dream symbolizes a mean person who He approaches her and follows her everywhere. As for the aphid leper, it is a harmful insect and it is not desirable to see it in the dreamer’s dream, as it alerts her to the presence of a deceitful and hypocritical friend. Ibn Shaheen added that seeing aphids in a girl’s dream indicates a financial crisis that her family will experience. Seeing small insects in A dream for a single woman: seeing small insects in a person’s dream indicates the presence of a bad person in words and actions, but they can be dealt with with caution and avoid harm. If

As for the aphid leper, it is a harmful insect and it is not desirable to see it in the dreamer’s dream, as it alerts her to the presence of a deceitful and hypocritical friend. Ibn Shaheen added that seeing aphids in a girl’s dream indicates a financial crisis that her family will experience. Seeing small insects in A dream for a single woman: seeing small insects in a person’s dream indicates the presence of a bad person in words and actions, but they can be dealt with with caution and avoid harm.
